General.Name: Y-S Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Y-S Electronic Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells cable assemblies, connectors, and PCB assemblies in Taiwan. Its products are used in information technology, telecommunication, video surveillance and monitoring system, automation technology, automotive accessories, and aviation IT sectors. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 2, Zhongfu Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 320
